resources.string:
"Sonček je lepši in ima 
nov fičr. Potegni slike 
od stranskih robov in 
dvoklikni za zoom."
Sonček is preetier and has new features. Swipe the images and double tap to zoom!
"The data is property of Slovenian Environment Agency. Data transmission charges may apply."
"Podatki so last Agencije RS za okolje. Operater lahko zaračuna prenos podatkov."
